sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient, HttpHeaders } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Injectable } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', }) @Injectable() export class LoginComponent { private apiUrl = 'http://localhost:5001'; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} login(email: string, password: string) { const data = { Email: email, Password: password, }; const headers = new HttpHeaders({ 'Content-Type': 'application/json', }); return this.http.post(`${this.apiUrl}/api/auth/signin`, data, { headers }); } }
